data.name: subject_change_pwd
data.value: [outdated]

data.name: pattern_change_pwd
data.value: [outdated]

data.name: subject_you_added_like_guest
data.value: Welcome to Your TeamLab Portal!

data.name: pattern_you_added_like_guest
data.value:
h1.Welcome to "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" Portal!
Dear $UserName,
You have been invited as guest user to the portal at "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}".
h3.Get started with your portal
# Edit your "profile":"$MyStaffLink" to add personal and contact details. # View and comment the content open available for all portal users in the "Community":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/community/", "Projects":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/projects/" modules. # Add and download files available for you in the "Documents":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/files/" module. # Organize your schedule with the built-in "Calendar":"${__VirtualRootPath}/addons/calendar/". # Start "Talk":"${__VirtualRootPath}/addons/talk/" to chat with other portal users online.
If you need help with your portal, we invite you to browse our "Help Center":"http://teamlab.com/help/helpcenter.aspx" . For any additional questions or feedback please feel free to contact us at "support@teamlab.com":"mailto:support@teamlab.com"
Best regards, TeamLab Support Team "www.teamlab.com":"http://teamlab.com/"

data.name: subject_you_added_after_invite
data.value: Welcome to Your TeamLab Portal!

data.name: pattern_you_added_after_invite
data.value:
h1.Welcome to "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" Portal!
Dear $UserName,
Your user profile has been successfully added to the portal at "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}".
h3.Get started with your portal
# Edit your "profile":"$MyStaffLink" to add personal and contact details. # Use "Community":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/community/" to start your blogs, forums, add events, photos, and more. # Create "Projects":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/projects/" and manage your workflow by adding milestones and tasks. # Upload, edit and organize "Documents":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/files/". # Manage your customer relations using "CRM":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/crm/" module, identify priority contacts, track communication history and sales performance. # Organize your work schedule with the built-in "Calendar":"${__VirtualRootPath}/addons/calendar/" tracking tasks and milestones due dates. # Start "Talk":"${__VirtualRootPath}/addons/talk/" to chat with your team members online. # Add your email account to "Teamlab Mail":"${__VirtualRootPath}/addons/mail/".
If you need help with your portal, we invite you to browse our "Help Center":"http://teamlab.com/help/helpcenter.aspx" . For any additional questions or feedback please feel free to contact us at "support@teamlab.com":"mailto:support@teamlab.com"
Best regards, TeamLab Support Team "www.teamlab.com":"http://teamlab.com/"

data.name: subject_profile_updated
data.value: Your Profile at ${__VirtualRootPath} has been Changed

data.name: pattern_profile_updated
data.value:
h1.Your Profile at "$__VirtualRootPath":"$__VirtualRootPath" has been Changed
Dear $UserName,
Your user profile details at "$__VirtualRootPath":"$__VirtualRootPath" have been changed by "$__AuthorName":"$__AuthorUrl".
To view your profile follow the link below: "$UserName":"$MyStaffLink"
^You receive this email because you are a registered user of the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal.^

data.name: subject_pwd_reminder
data.value: [outdated]

data.name: pattern_pwd_reminder
data.value: [outdated]

data.name: subject_invite
data.value: Invitation to Join TeamLab Portal

data.name: pattern_invite
data.value:
h1.Invitation to Join TeamLab Portal
Dear $UserDisplayName,
$__AuthorName has invited you to join Teamlab Office - your team's portal that would enchance internal cooperation. Your portal address is "${__VirtualRootPath}":"$InviteLink" (adding this link to your bookmarks is a good idea, you are most likely to get to use it a lot).
You can accept the invitation by following the link below, it is only valid for 7 days:
p=. "Click here to join the portal":"$InviteLink"

data.name: subject_join
data.value: Invitation to Join ${__VirtualRootPath} Portal

data.name: pattern_join
data.value:
h1.Invitation to Join "${__VirtualRootPath}":"$InviteLink" Portal
Hello,
You have requested to join the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"$InviteLink" portal at Teamlab - a platform for document and project management. Join the portal and start collaborating with your colleagues or friends right away.
To accept the invitation please enter your name and password following this link: "$InviteLink":"$InviteLink"
*Note*: this link is valid for 48 hours only. Please complete the operation within that period.
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@teamlab.com":"mailto:support@teamlab.com"
Best regards, TeamLab Support Team "www.teamlab.com":"http://teamlab.com/"

data.name: subject_self_profile_updated
data.value: ${__VirtualRootPath} Portal Profile Change Notification

data.name: pattern_self_profile_updated
data.value:
h1."${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" Portal Profile Change Notification
"$__AuthorName":"$__AuthorUrl" has changed his/her profile details at the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal.
^You receive this email because you are an administrator of the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal. If you do not want to receive the notifications about profile updates, please manage your "subscription settings":"$RecipientSubscriptionConfigURL".^

data.name: subject_user_has_join
data.value: New User Added to TeamLab Portal

data.name: pattern_user_has_join
data.value:
h1.New User Added to "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" Portal
"$__AuthorName":"$__AuthorUrl" has joined your portal at "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}".
^You receive this email because you are an administrator user of the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal. If you do not want to receive the notifications about new users, please manage your "subscription settings":"$RecipientSubscriptionConfigURL".^

data.name: subject_send_whats_new
data.value: What's New on Your Portal for $Date

data.name: pattern_send_whats_new
data.value:
h1.What's New on "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" Portal for $Date
#foreach($activity in $Activities)
h2.$activity.Key
#foreach($whatsNewActivity in $activity.Value) #foreach($b in $whatsNewActivity.BreadCrumbs) h3.$b #end "$whatsNewActivity.Title":"$whatsNewActivity.URL" *Author*: "$whatsNewActivity.UserName":"$whatsNewActivity.UserAbsoluteURL", published: $whatsNewActivity.Date.ToShortTimeString()
#end
#end
^You receive this email because you are a registered user of the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal. If you do not want to receive the notifications about the new events on the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal, please manage your "subscription settings":"$RecipientSubscriptionConfigURL".^

data.name: subject_backup_created
data.value: TeamLab. ${__VirtualRootPath} Portal Backup Created

data.name: pattern_backup_created
data.value:
h1."${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" Portal Backup Created
Dear $OwnerName,
A backup file containing data from your "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal has been created. It is available for download under the following link: "$BackupUrl":"$BackupUrl"
*Note*: this link is valid for $BackupHours hours only. Please complete the operation within that period.
To learn more on the backup/restore procedure please refer to our "How to Create and Restore the TeamLab Portal Backup":"http://www.teamlab.com/content/CreateandRestoreBackup.pdf" PDF user guide.
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@teamlab.com":"mailto:support@teamlab.com"
Best regards, TeamLab Support Team "www.teamlab.com":"http://teamlab.com/"

data.name: subject_portal_deactivate
data.value: Deactivation of the ${__VirtualRootPath} Portal

data.name: pattern_portal_deactivate
data.value:
h1.Deactivation of the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" Portal
Dear $OwnerName,
You have requested a temporary deactivation of your "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal. Please follow the link below to confirm the operation: "$DeactivateUrl":"$DeactivateUrl"
*Note*: this link is valid for 7 days only. Please complete the portal deactivation process within that period.
You can reactivate your portal any time by clicking the following link: "$ActivateUrl":"$ActivateUrl" (this link has no time limit)
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@teamlab.com":"mailto:support@teamlab.com"
Best regards, TeamLab Support Team "www.teamlab.com":"http://teamlab.com/"

data.name: subject_portal_delete
data.value: Deletion of the ${__VirtualRootPath} Portal

data.name: pattern_portal_delete
data.value:
h1.Deletion of the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" Portal
Dear $OwnerName,
You have requested to permanently delete your "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal.
*Important! All the data stored on your portal, as well as your registration details will be lost and cannot be recovered.*
If you still want to delete your "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal please follow the link below to confirm the operation: "$DeleteUrl":"$DeleteUrl"
*Note*: this link is valid for 7 days only. Please complete the portal deletion process within that period.
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@teamlab.com":"mailto:support@teamlab.com"
Best regards, TeamLab Support Team "www.teamlab.com":"http://teamlab.com/"

data.name: subject_dns_change
data.value: TeamLab. Change of Portal Address

data.name: pattern_dns_change
data.value:
h1.Change of Portal Address
Dear $OwnerName,
There has been a request to change the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal address to "$PortalAddress":"$PortalAddress" #if($PortalDns != "") ("$PortalDns":"$PortalDns" )#end.
Please follow the link below to confirm the operation: "$ConfirmDnsUpdate":"$ConfirmDnsUpdate"
*Note*: this link is valid for 7 days only. Please complete the portal address change process within that period.
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@teamlab.com":"mailto:support@teamlab.com"
Best regards, TeamLab Support Team "www.teamlab.com":"http://teamlab.com/"

data.name: pattern_confirm_owner_change
data.value:
h1.Change of "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" Portal Owner
Dear $OwnerName,
There has been a request to change the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal owner to $UserName.
Please follow the link below to confirm the operation: "$ConfirmPortalOwnerUpdate":"$ConfirmPortalOwnerUpdate"
*Note*: this link is valid for 7 days only. Please complete the portal owner change process within that period.
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@teamlab.com":"mailto:support@teamlab.com"
Best regards, TeamLab Support Team "www.teamlab.com":"http://teamlab.com/"

data.name: subject_confirm_owner_change
data.value: TeamLab. Change of Portal Owner

data.name: pattern_activate
data.value:
h1.Invitation to Join TeamLab Portal
Dear $UserName,
$__AuthorName has invited you to join Teamlab Office - your team's portal that would enchance internal cooperation. Your portal address is "${__VirtualRootPath}":"$InviteLink" (adding this link to your bookmarks is a good idea, you are most likely to get to use it a lot).
You can accept the invitation by following the link below, it is only valid for 7 days:
p=. "Click here to join the portal":"$InviteLink"

data.name: pattern_change_email
data.value:
h1.Email Address Change Request
You have requested to change your email address used to enter the TeamLab portal.
Please follow the link below to change your email address: "$InviteLink":"$InviteLink"
*Note*: this link is valid for 7 days only. Please complete your email change process within that period.
If you do not want to change your email or received this email by mistake, please ignore it or contact your portal administrator to find out the details.
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@teamlab.com":"mailto:support@teamlab.com"
Best regards, TeamLab Support Team "www.teamlab.com":"http://teamlab.com/"

data.name: subject_activate
data.value: Invitation from $__AuthorName to Join ${__VirtualRootPath} Portal

data.name: subject_change_email
data.value: TeamLab. Email change request

data.name: pattern_change_password
data.value:
h1.Password Change Request for the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" Portal
There has been a request to change your password used to enter the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal.
Please follow the link below to change your password: "$InviteLink":"$InviteLink"
*Note*: this link is valid for 7 days only. Please complete the password change process within that period.
If you do not want to change your password or received this email by mistake, please ignore it or contact your "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal administrator to find out the details.
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@teamlab.com":"mailto:support@teamlab.com"
Best regards, TeamLab Support Team "www.teamlab.com":"http://teamlab.com/"

data.name: subject_change_password
data.value: TeamLab Password Assistance

data.name: pattern_activate_email
data.value:
h1.Activate Your Email for "${__VirtualRootPath}":"$InviteLink" Portal.
Hello $UserDisplayName,
To start participating in the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"$InviteLink" portal life you need to activate your email address. This is done for security reasons.
p=. "Click here to activate your email address":"$InviteLink"
This link is valid for 7 days only. Please complete your email activation within that period.

data.name: subject_activate_email
data.value: TeamLab. Please activate your email address

data.name: pattern_change_phone
data.value:
h1.Mobile Phone Change Request
You have requested to change your mobile phone used to enter the TeamLab portal.
Please follow the link below to change your mobile phone:
"$InviteLink":"$InviteLink"
If you do not want to change your mobile phone or received this email by mistake, please ignore it or contact your portal administrator to find out the details.

data.name: pattern_profile_delete
data.value:
h1.Removal of the Profile from the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" Portal
You have requested to permanently delete your profile from the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal.
If you still want to delete your profile please follow the link below to confirm the operation: "$InviteLink":"$InviteLink"
*Note*: this link is valid for 7 days only. Please complete the profile deletion process within that period.
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@teamlab.com":"mailto:support@teamlab.com"

data.value:
h1.Message from the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" Portal Email: $UserEmail
$Body

data.name: subject_for_admin_notify
data.value: User message to administrators

data.name: pattern_admin_sms_balance
data.value: h1.Message from the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" Portal Balance SMS: $Body

data.name: subject_admin_sms_balance
data.value: Notification to administrators about SMS balance

data.name: pattern_congratulations
data.value:
h1.Welcome to TeamLab Portal!
Dear $UserName,
You have just created your TeamLab portal at "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}". Starting from now you will have an opportunity to explore TeamLab Office Edition without any limitations for 45 days. Follow the link below to confirm your email address:
p=. "Click here for confirmation":"$InviteLink"
Please, complete your email activation within a week as the link is valid for 7 days only.
$NoteStart *Note: * we do not send out confidential information (like your password) in emails for safety reasons. You may change your email or password in your "personal profile page":"$MyStaffLink". Language and time zone can be altered in "general settings":"$SettingsLink". $NoteEnd

data.name: subject_congratulations
data.value: Welcome to TeamLab Portal!

data.name: pattern_tariff_warning_trial2
data.value:
Dear $UserName,
Thank you for having given TeamLab Office a try. The free plan for your portal at "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" is due to expire today.
To continue using your account, proceed to the "Pricing page":"$PricingPage", where you can check out all the models and choose the most suitable for you. If any questions related to our pricing and payment policy arise, please, consult the "FAQ section":"$FAQ".

data.name: pattern_tariff_warning_trial
data.value:
Dear $UserName,
Thank you for checking out TeamLab Office service. Hope, everything's going fine. We just want to remind you that the trial period for your account at "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" will be over in five days.
At the moment the number of active users at the portal is $ActiveUsers.
If you're not going to increase it considerably, we can recommend you a $$Price/$PricePeriod plan.
Please, check all the available options and choose the most suitable rate for your business.
$GreenButton
$BlueButton

data.name: subject_tariff_warning_trial2
data.value: Your TeamLab Office trial expires today

data.name: subject_tariff_warning_trial
data.value: How is your trial going so far?

data.name: pattern_activate_personal
data.value:
Hello, $UserName You’ve been successfully registered at Teamlab Personal "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}".
Connect your favorite cloud storage: Dropbox, Google Drive, SkyDrive or Box to create a single workspace for your documents accessible from anywhere.
Learn more about Teamlab Personal in "our blog":"$TagBlogLink".
We're glad you're here. Stay tuned!
Sincerely, TeamLab Office Team.

data.name: subject_activate_personal
data.value: Welcome to TeamLab Portal!

data.name: pattern_activate_guest
data.value:
h1. Invitation from $__AuthorName to Join "${__VirtualRootPath}":"$InviteLink"
Dear $UserName,
You have been invited as a guest user to the portal at "${__VirtualRootPath}":"$InviteLink". Please accept the invitation by following the link below, it is only valid for 7 days:
p=. "Click here to join the portal":"$InviteLink"
If you need help with your portal, we invite you to browse our "Help Center":"http://teamlab.com/help/helpcenter.aspx" . For any additional questions or feedback please feel free to contact us at "support@teamlab.com":"mailto:support@teamlab.com"
Best regards, TeamLab Support Team "www.teamlab.com":"http://teamlab.com/"

data.name: subject_activate_guest
data.value: Invitation from $__AuthorName to Join ${__VirtualRootPath} Portal

data.name: pattern_migration_start
data.value:
h1.Another Region Portal Migration Started
The portal migration to the $RegionName region is started. It might take some time depending on your data amount.
*Note*: the portal will not be available during the migration process. After the migration is complete the portal URL will be changed and all the shared documents links will be inaccessible.
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@teamlab.com":"mailto:support@teamlab.com"
Best regards, TeamLab Support Team "www.teamlab.com":"http://teamlab.com/"
^You receive this email because you are a registered user of the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal. To change the notification type, please manage your "subscription settings":"$RecipientSubscriptionConfigURL".^

data.name: pattern_migration_success
data.value:
h1.Another Region Portal Migration Successfully Completed
The portal migration to the $RegionName region is successfully completed. Your portal is now available at "$PortalUrl":"$PortalUrl"
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@teamlab.com":"mailto:support@teamlab.com"
Best regards, TeamLab Support Team "www.teamlab.com":"http://teamlab.com/"
^You receive this email because you are a registered user of the "$PortalUrl":"$PortalUrl" portal.^

data.name: subject_migration_start
data.value: TeamLab. Another Region Portal Migration Started

data.name: subject_migration_success
data.value: TeamLab. Another Region Portal Migration Successfully Completed

data.name: pattern_migration_error
data.value:
h1.Another Region Portal Migration Error
An error has occurred while migrating to the $RegionName region. Please, try once again later. Your portal is now available at the old address "$PortalUrl":"$PortalUrl"
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@teamlab.com":"mailto:support@teamlab.com"
Best regards, TeamLab Support Team "www.teamlab.com":"http://teamlab.com/"
^You receive this email because you are a registered user of the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal. To change the notification type, please manage your "subscription settings":"$RecipientSubscriptionConfigURL".^

data.name: subject_migration_error
data.value: TeamLab. Another Region Portal Migration Error

data.name: pattern_migration_server_failure
data.value:
h1.Another Region Portal Migration Error
An error has occurred while migrating to another region. Please, try once again later. Your portal is now available at the old address "$PortalUrl":"$PortalUrl"
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@teamlab.com":"mailto:support@teamlab.com"
Best regards, TeamLab Support Team "www.teamlab.com":"http://teamlab.com/"
^You receive this email because you are a registered user of the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal. To change the notification type, please manage your "subscription settings":"$RecipientSubscriptionConfigURL".^

data.name: pattern_tariff_warning_trial3
data.value:
h1.Need to Extend Your Teamlab Trial?
We know, business days can be crazy sometimes. If you haven't got an opportunity to take a closer look at TeamLab Office and would like to get a little bit more of your trial period, we're in!
Today you have a chance to get *20 additional days* and push your trial to the limit.
$GreenButton
$BlueButton

data.name: subject_tariff_warning_trial3
data.value: Need to Extend Your TeamLab Trial?

data.name: ButtonExtendTrialButton
data.value: Extend Your Teamlab Trial Now

data.name: ButtonRequestCallButton
data.value: Request a Call

data.name: ButtonSelectPricingPlans
data.value: Select the Pricing Plans Right Now

data.name: pattern_after_creation2
data.value:
h1. Features You Might Have Missed in TeamLab
Hi $UserName,
Sometimes the most useful tools are not the most obvious. There is always much to be discovered, so we do our best to guide you through the every single corner of your cloud office.
Here is the Top 5 TeamLab features which you might have missed: $TableItemsTop $TableItem1 $TableItem2 $TableItem3 $TableItem4 $TableItem5 $TableItemsBtm $GreenButton

data.name: pattern_after_creation3
data.value:
h1. Improve your Document Management Experience
Modern businesses have to handle too much paperwork and can't afford to shift it back and forth between desktop and online. We suggest you stop hesitating and challenge your cloud office!
*Our goal is to transfer all of your paperwork to the cloud*
These 5 tips will move you closer to the aim: $TableItemsTop $TableItem1 $TableItem2 $TableItem3 $TableItem4 $TableItem5 $TableItemsBtm $GreenButton

data.name: subject_after_creation1
data.value: Invite your teammates to the cloud office!

data.name: subject_after_creation2
data.value: Features You Might Have Missed in TeamLab

data.name: subject_after_creation3
data.value: Improve your Document Management Experience

data.name: pattern_after_creation4
data.value:
h1. Pack your office to the cloud. What to start with?
Dear $UserName,
With TeamLab you have all your data in one place available from the cloud. There is no more need for additional desktop software or flash drives. Be productive and access your office at "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" from anywhere!
Start your migration to the cloud office with these 5 steps: $TableItemsTop $TableItem1 $TableItem2 $TableItem3 $TableItem4 $TableItem5 $TableItemsBtm

data.name: subject_after_creation4
data.value: Pack your office to the cloud. What to start with?

data.name: ItemAddEmailAccount
data.value: Add your email account to TeamLab Mail and manage all correspondence in one place

data.name: ItemAddFilesCreatWorkspace
data.value: Add files from your cloud storages to create a single workspace for all your docs

data.name: ItemAddTeamlabMail
data.value: Add your email account to TeamLab Mail

data.name: ItemAttachFilesCrm
data.value: Attach files to CRM sections

data.name: ItemCreatCoeditDocs
data.value: Create and co-edit docs with your colleagues

data.name: ItemCreateWorkspaceDocs
data.value: Create a single workspace for all your docs

data.name: ItemFeatureARM
data.value: ARM

data.name: ItemFeatureARMText
data.value: set up individual access rights for each file and project

data.name: ItemFeatureCalendar
data.value: Calendar

data.name: ItemFeatureCalendarText
data.value: share your schedule with colleagues

data.name: ItemFeatureCoediting
data.value: Real time co-editing

data.name: ItemFeatureCoeditingText
data.value: work on documents simultaneuosly

data.name: ItemFeatureCRM
data.value: CRM customization

data.name: ItemFeatureCRMText
data.value: set up CRM system according to your needs

data.name: ItemFeatureMail
data.value: Mail

data.name: ItemFeatureMailText
data.value: make use of TeamLab mail aggregator

data.name: ItemImportProjectsBasecamp
data.value: Import projects from Basecamp

data.name: ItemIntegrateIM
data.value: Integrate your IM client with TeamLab talk and stay tuned

data.name: ItemOrganazeTeamDocs
data.value: Organize and manage your team documentation

data.name: ItemShareDocsPeople
data.value: Share them with people outside the portal

data.name: ItemTryOnlineDocEditor
data.value: Try full-featured online document editing in your browser

data.name: ItemUploadCrmContacts
data.value: Upload CRM contacts to TeamLab to access them everywhere

data.name: ItemUploadCrmContactsCsv
data.value: Upload CRM contacts from a csv. file

data.name: ItemUseOnlineEditor
data.value: Make use of the 1st full-featured online docs editor

data.name: pattern_after_creation1
data.value:
h1. Invite your teammates to the cloud office!
Dear $UserName,
Recently a TeamLab portal "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" has been created for your team. To add colleagues distribute the invitation link available in your cloud office. Please follow these instructions:
# Click the *Settings* option on the left-side panel within the *People* module # Switch to the *General* option # Roll down the page till you see the *Invitation Link* caption # Check the *Add users as guests* box to invite people who will have view-only permissions on your portal (if you want these people to create portal content, leave this box unchecked) # Copy the link and send it to your teammates
h2. What to start your work with? $TableItemsTop $TableItem1 $TableItem2 $TableItem3 $TableItem4 $TableItemsBtm

data.name: ButtonLogInTeamlab
data.value: Log in to TeamLab Office

data.name: ItemImportProjects
data.value: Import projects

data.name: ItemIntegrateDocs
data.value: Integrate documents

data.name: ItemUploadCrm
data.value: Upload CRM contacts

data.name: pattern_congratulations_notrial
data.value:
h1.Welcome to TeamLab Portal!
Dear $UserName,
You have just created your TeamLab portal at "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}". Follow the link below to confirm your email address:
p=. "Click here for confirmation":"$InviteLink"
Please, complete your email activation within a week as the link is valid for 7 days only.
$NoteStart *Note: * we do not send out confidential information (like your password) in emails for safety reasons. You may change your email or password in your "personal profile page":"$MyStaffLink". Language and time zone can be altered in "general settings":"$SettingsLink". $NoteEnd

data.name: pattern_portal_delete_success
data.value:
Dear $OwnerName,
Your portal "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" has been successfully deleted but we would highly appreciate your feedback. Please share your experience of using Teamlab Office and give us a hint on how could we make it better. Your opinion is very impotant for us!
Please, fill this form to leave your feedback - "$FeedBackUrl":"$FeedBackUrl"
It will take you just a minute.
Thank you and good luck! Teamlab Office.

data.name: subject_portal_delete_success
data.value: Successful deletion of the ${__VirtualRootPath} Portal

data.name: ButtonSignUpPersonal
data.value: Sign Up to Teamlab Personal

data.name: pattern_tariff_warning_trial4
data.value:
Dear $UserName,
Even if you have no team or project to manage, Teamlab still has something to offer!
We'd like to invite you to TeamLab Personal, a *free workspace to manage your documents*, combining the convenience and mobility of online apps with the rich toolset of desktop solutions.
To get a quick start all you do is sign up via your Facebook or Google account. As soon as you're there you'll be able to:
# Connect your favorite cloud storage: Dropbox, Google Drive, SkyDrive or Box. # Work with texts, spreadsheets and presentations and share them with your friends. # Co-edit and comment files, collaborate on them in real-time. # Embed documents to your web page. # View files from your iOS or Android tablet.
